00017 /*!\fn int init_particle_system( PARTICLE_SYSTEM **psys , int max , double x , double y , double z )
00018 *\brief Initialize a particle system
00019 *\param psys a pointer to a NULL initialized particle system
00020 *\param max maximum number of particles in the system
00021 *\param x position of particles emitter
00022 *\param y position of particles emitter
00023 *\param z position of particles emitter
00024 *\return TRUE or FALSE
00025 */
00026 int init_particle_system( PARTICLE_SYSTEM **psys , int max , double x , double y , double z )
00027 {
00028                 Malloc( (*psys) , PARTICLE_SYSTEM , 1 );
00029                 if( !(*psys) )
00030                                 return FALSE ;
00031                 
00032                 (*psys) -> list_start = (*psys) -> list_end = NULL ;
00033 
00034                 start_HiTimer( &(*psys) -> timer );
00035 
00036                 (*psys) -> max_particles = max ;
00037                 (*psys) -> nb_particles  = 0 ;
00038                 (*psys) -> x = x ;
00039                 (*psys) -> y = y ;
00040                 (*psys) -> z = z ;
00041 
00042                 return TRUE ;
00043 } /* init_particle_system */

00047 /*!\fn int add_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys , BITMAP *spr , int mode , int off_x , int off_y , int off_z , int lifetime , int color , double vx , double vy , double vz , double ax , double ay , double az )
00048 *\brief Add a particle to a particle system
00049 *\param psys Aimed particle system
00050 *\param spr Sprite of the particle, if any
00051 *\param mode Type of particle, NORMAL_PART or SINUS_PART, coupled eventually with TRANS_PART|RECYLCING_PART
00052 *\param off_x ofsset X from particle system X source
00053 *\param off_y ofsset Y from particle system Y source
00054 *\param off_z ofsset Z from particle system Z source
00055 *\param lifetime Lifetime of the particle
00056 *\param color color of the particle
00057 *\param vx X speed of the particle
00058 *\param vy Y speed of the particle
00059 *\param vz Z speed of the particle
00060 *\param ax X acceleration of the particle
00061 *\param ay Y acceleration of the particle
00062 *\param az Z acceleration of the particle
00063 *\return TRUE or FALSE
00064 */
00065 int add_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys , BITMAP *spr , int mode , int off_x , int off_y , int off_z ,
00066                                 , int lifetime , int color ,
00067                                                                   double vx , double vy , double vz ,
00068                                                                   double ax , double ay , double az )
00069 {
00070                 if( psys -> nb_particles >= psys -> max_particles )
00071                                 return FALSE ;
00072 
00073                 if( !psys -> list_start ) /* no particles */
00074                 {
00075                                 Malloc( psys -> list_start , PARTICLE , 1 );
00076 
00077                                 psys -> list_start -> prev = psys -> list_start -> next = NULL ;
00078                                 psys -> list_end = psys -> list_start ;
00079 
00080                                 psys -> list_start -> sprite = spr ;
00081                                 psys -> list_start -> mode = mode ;
00082                                 psys -> list_start -> off_x = off_x ;
00083                                 psys -> list_start -> off_y = off_y ;
00084                                 psys -> list_start -> off_z = off_z ;
00085                                 psys -> list_start -> lifetime = lifetime ;
00086                                 psys -> list_start -> x = psys -> x + off_x ;
00087                                 psys -> list_start -> y = psys -> y + off_y ;
00088                                 psys -> list_start -> z = psys -> z + off_z ;
00089                                 psys -> list_start -> ax = ax ;
00090                                 psys -> list_start -> ay = ay ;
00091                                 psys -> list_start -> az = az ;
00092                                 psys -> list_start -> vx = vx ;
00093                                 psys -> list_start -> vy = vy ;
00094                                 psys -> list_start -> vz = vz ;
00095                                 psys -> list_start -> color = color ;
00096 
00097                                 psys -> nb_particles ++ ;
00098 
00099                                 return TRUE;
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 Malloc( psys -> list_end -> next , PARTICLE , 1 );
00103                 psys -> list_end -> next -> prev = psys -> list_end ;
00104                 psys -> list_end -> next -> next = NULL ;
00105                 psys -> list_end = psys -> list_end -> next ;
00106                 psys -> list_end -> sprite = spr ;
00107                 psys -> list_end -> mode = mode ;
00108                 psys -> list_end -> off_x = off_x ;
00109                 psys -> list_end -> off_y = off_y ;
00110                 psys -> list_end -> lifetime = lifetime ;
00111                 psys -> list_end -> x = psys -> x + off_x ;
00112                 psys -> list_end -> y = psys -> y + off_y ;
00113                 psys -> list_end -> z = psys -> z + off_z ;
00114                 psys -> list_end -> ax = ax ;
00115                 psys -> list_end -> ay = ay ;
00116                 psys -> list_end -> az = az ;
00117                 psys -> list_end -> vx = vx ;
00118                 psys -> list_end -> vy = vy ;
00119                 psys -> list_end -> vz = vz ;
00120                 psys -> list_end -> color = color ;
00121 
00122                 psys -> nb_particles ++ ;
00123 
00124                 return TRUE ;
00125 
00126 } /* add_particle */

00130 /*!\fn int manage_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys)
00131 *\brief Compute particles movements and cycle
00132 *\param psys The particle system
00133 *\return TRUE of FALSE
00134 */
00135 int manage_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys)
00136 {
00137                 PARTICLE *ptr = NULL , *next = NULL , *prev = NULL ;
00138                 
00139                 double tmp_v = 0 ;
00140 
00141                 ptr = psys -> list_start ;
00142 
00143                 double delta = 0 ;
00144 
00145                 delta = get_msec( &psys -> timer ) ;
00146 
00147                 while( ptr )
00148                 {
00149                                 ptr -> lifetime -= delta ;
00150 
00151                                 if( ptr -> lifetime > 0 )
00152                                 {
00153                                                 tmp_v = ptr -> vx + ( ptr -> ax * ((delta * delta)/1000) ) / 2 ;
00154                                                 ptr -> x = ptr -> x + delta * ( ptr -> vx + tmp_v ) / 2000 ;
00155                                                 ptr -> vx = tmp_v ;
00156                                                 
00157                                                 tmp_v = ptr -> vy + ( ptr -> ay * ((delta * delta)/1000) ) / 2 ;
00158                                                 ptr -> y = ptr -> y + delta * ( ptr -> vy + tmp_v ) / 2000 ;
00159                                                 ptr -> vy = tmp_v ;
00160                                                 
00161                                                 tmp_v = ptr -> vz + ( ptr -> az * ((delta * delta)/1000) ) / 2 ;
00162                                                 ptr -> z = ptr -> z + delta * ( ptr -> vz + tmp_v ) / 2000 ;
00163                                                 ptr -> vz = tmp_v ;
00164                                                 
00165                                                 ptr = ptr -> next ;
00166                                 }
00167                                 else
00168                                 {
00169                                                 next = ptr -> next ;
00170                                                 prev = ptr -> prev ;
00171 
00172                                                 if( next )
00173                                                 {
00174                                                                 if( prev )
00175                                                                                 next -> prev = prev ;
00176                                                                 else
00177                                                                 {
00178                                                                                 next -> prev = NULL ;
00179                                                                                 psys -> list_start = next ;
00180                                                                 }
00181                                                 }
00182 
00183                                                 if( prev )
00184                                                 {
00185                                                                 if( next )
00186                                                                                 prev -> next = next ;
00187                                                                 else
00188                                                                 {
00189                                                                                 prev -> next = NULL ;
00190                                                                                 psys -> list_end = prev ;
00191                                                                 }
00192                                                 }
00193 
00194                                                 Free( ptr );
00195                                                 psys -> nb_particles -- ;
00196                                                 if( psys -> nb_particles <= 0 )
00197                 psys -> list_start = psys -> list_end = NULL ;
00198 
00199                                                 ptr = next ;
00200                                 }
00201                 }
00202 
00203                 return TRUE;
00204 } /* manage_particle */

00208 /*!\fn int draw_particle( BITMAP *bmp , PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys )
00209  *\brief Draw a particle system onto a bitmap
00210  *\param bmp the aimed particle system
00211  *\param psys the partciel system to draw
00212  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00213  */
00214 int draw_particle( BITMAP *bmp , PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys )
00215 {
00216                 PARTICLE *ptr = NULL ;
00217 
00218                 double x = 0 , y = 0 ;
00219 
00220                 ptr = psys -> list_start ;
00221 
00222                 while( ptr )
00223                 {
00224                                 x = ptr -> x ;
00225                                 y = ptr -> y ;
00226 
00227                                 if( ptr -> mode & SINUS_PART )
00228                                 {
00229                                     if( ptr -> vx != 0 )
00230                                                                 x = x + ptr -> vx * sin( (ptr -> x/ptr -> vx) ) ;
00231                                                 else
00232                                                                 x = x + ptr -> vx * sin( ptr -> x );
00233 
00234                                                 if( ptr -> vy != 0 )
00235                                                                 y = y + ptr -> vy * cos( (ptr -> y/ptr -> vy) ) ;
00236                                                 else
00237                                                                 y = y + ptr -> vy * sin( ptr -> y ) ;
00238                                                 
00239                                                 if( ptr -> vz != 0 )
00240                                                                 z = z + ptr -> vz * cos( (ptr -> z/ptr -> vz) ) ;
00241                                                 else
00242                                                                 z = z + ptr -> vz * sin( ptr -> z ) ;
00243                                 }
00244 
00245                                 if( ptr -> mode & TRANS_PART )
00246                                 {
00247                                      drawing_mode(DRAW_MODE_TRANS, NULL, 0, 0);
00248                                      set_alpha_blender( );
00249              draw_trans_sprite( bmp , ptr -> sprite , x - ptr -> sprite -> w / 2 , y - ptr -> sprite -> h /2 );
00250                      drawing_mode(DRAW_MODE_SOLID, NULL, 0, 0);
00251 
00252         }
00253         else
00254         {
00255             if( ptr -> sprite )
00256             {
00257                 #ifdef DEBUGMODE
00258                                                                                 circle( bmp , x - ptr -> sprite -> w / 2 , y - ptr -> sprite -> h / 2 , 3 ,  makecol( 255 , 255 , 0 ) );
00259                 #endif
00260                                                                 masked_blit( ptr -> sprite , bmp , 0 , 0 , x - ptr -> sprite -> w / 2 , y - ptr -> sprite -> h /2, ptr -> sprite -> w , ptr -> sprite -> h );
00261             }
00262             else
00263                 circle( bmp , x , y , 2 , ptr -> color );
00264         }
00265 
00266         ptr = ptr -> next ;
00267                 }
00268 
00269                 return TRUE;
00270 } /* drax_particle */

00274 /*!\fn int free_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys , PARTICLE **ptr )
00275 *\brief Free a particle from a particle system 
00276 *\param psys The aimed particle system
00277 *\param ptr A pointer to a particle to delete
00278 *\return TRUE or FALSE
00279 */
00280 int free_particle( PARTICLE_SYSTEM *psys , PARTICLE **ptr )
00281 {
00282     PARTICLE *next = NULL , *prev = NULL ;
00283 
00284     next = (*ptr) -> next ;
00285     prev = (*ptr) -> prev ;
00286 
00287     if( next )
00288     {
00289         if( prev )
00290             next -> prev = prev ;
00291         else
00292         {
00293             next -> prev = NULL ;
00294             psys -> list_start = next ;
00295         }
00296     }
00297 
00298     if( prev )
00299     {
00300         if( next )
00301             prev -> next = next ;
00302         else
00303         {
00304             prev -> next = NULL ;
00305             psys -> list_end = prev ;
00306         }
00307     }
00308 
00309     Free( (*ptr) );
00310 
00311     psys -> nb_particles -- ;
00312 
00313     if( psys -> nb_particles <= 0 )
00314         psys -> list_start = psys -> list_end = NULL ;
00315 
00316     (*ptr) = next ;
00317 
00318     return TRUE ;
00319 } /* free_particle(...) */
00320

00323 /*!\fn int free_particle_system( PARTICLE_SYSTEM **psys)
00324 *\brief free a particle system
00325 *\param psys a pointer to a particle system to delete
00326 *\return TRUE or FALSE
00327 */
00328 int free_particle_system( PARTICLE_SYSTEM **psys)
00329 {
00330                 PARTICLE *ptr = NULL , *ptr_next = NULL ;
00331 
00332                 ptr = (*psys) -> list_start ;
00333 
00334                 while( ptr )
00335                 {
00336                                 ptr_next = ptr -> next ;
00337                                 Free( ptr ) ;
00338                                 ptr = ptr_next ;
00339                 }
00340 
00341                 Free( (*psys) );
00342 
00343                 return TRUE;
00344 }
